text: It’d be great if the select + multi-select fields in HubDB had both a “pretty” name and a value. For example *Agriculture Farming* would be the “pretty” name and *agriculture_farming* would be the value. Or *Oil, Gas, & Energy* would be the “pretty” name and *oil_gas_energy* would be the value. I often use these fields for filtering via a custom module and the pretty names make it a pain. ACF in WordPress does a really good job of this offering both a pretty and value as a return format.
Hey Tony, this is a great idea, would you be able to post this to the ideas community forum? Then you can post a link back to the idea here for others to upvote as well.
Probably worth mentioning that _both_ values should be available in HubL. (AFAIK, they aren’t when using choice fields in custom modules.)
